sentence.Network_en: No one in the neighbouring flats was unawakened by the noise.
In this story Lu Hsun writes mainly about a peasant who is backward and politically unawakened.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲁迅在这篇小说里面,主要是写一个落后的不觉悟的农民.

sentence.Network_en: Someone called his drawings as Neo - Orientalism painting, and thought he built an unawakened altruism world.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人将他的绘画称为“新东方主义”绘画, 认为他营造了一种无我不分、浑然未醒、混沌整一的世界.

auth_sentence.content: To me, on this side, your anger is a failure of perception, your sense of betrayal a sign of the unawakened heart.
